string-array.name: horoscopesDetailsList
string-array.item:
General Properties

 	Your ruling star: Mars

 	Your group: Fire

 	Your lucky day: Tuesday

 	Your lucky number: 8

 	Your lucky colour: Fire red

 	Your lucky stones: Opal, diamond, sapphire

 	Your lucky flowers: Tulip, daisy

 	Your lucky scents: Magnolia, lavender, geranium

 	Your positive trait: Courage

 	Your negative trait: Hasteness

 	Agreeable signs: Leo, Sagittarius

 	The zodiac signs you can't get along with: Cancer, Libra, Capricorn

 	Professions in which you will be successful: Politician, management, business administration, engineering, painting, musicianship, acting

 	Celebrities from your zodiac sign: Fatih Sultan Mehmet, Sakıp Sabancı, Descartes, Charlie Chaplin, Vincent Van Gogh, Zeki Alasya

General Properties

 	Your negative trait: Stubbornness

 	Agreeable signs: Cancer, Pisces

 	The zodiac signs you can't get along with: Aquarius, Leo, Scorpio

 	Professions in which you will be successful: Military, doctor, architecture, engineering, banking

 	Celebrities from your zodiac sign: Nükhet Duru, Öztürk Serengil, Salvadore Dali, Karl Marx, Lenin, Sigmund Freud, Shakespare
